name: San Francisco Day Labor Program
description: The San Francisco Day Labor Program is a grassroots-organized program deeply rooted in the community with strong support of key stakeholders. The program is directed towards prospective employers who only speak Spanish and offers different contract jobs throughout the city.
fullDescription: The San Francisco Day Labor Program is a grassroots-organized program deeply rooted in the community with strong support of key stakeholders. The program is directed towards prospective employers who only speak Spanish and offers different contract jobs throughout the city.
